```{r}
pups=read.csv("./data/FAS_pups.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(litter_number) %>%
  gather(key=PD_outcome, value=days, pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  arrange(litter_number,pd_outcome)
```
